item.title: Firefox アドオンと署名、ついでにデフォルトブラウザー
item.description: Mozilla verifies and "signs" add-ons that follow a set of guidelines to ensure that users' information will not be stolen or manipulated. All add-ons hosted on addons.mozilla.org undergo this review process in order to be verified and signed.
